data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Dave Gantar awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 1, Seattle are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 5, Dave Gantar signals a Seattle throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dave Gantar awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at CenturyLink Field.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Dave Gantar blows against Seattle's Jordan Morris for offside.
Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Will Bruin for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 15, Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Salt Lake.

In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.

Nicolas Lodeiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seattle.

Cristian Roldan with an assist there.
In the minute 31, Seattle to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Dave Gantar signals a free kick to Seattle.
Corner awarded to Seattle.

It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.

Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Seattle.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.

Dave Gantar awards the home team a throw-in.

Free kick in a good position for Seattle!

Great play from Nicolas Lodeiro to set up the goal.

Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.

Own goal in Seattle! Nouhou Tolo scores in his own net to make it 2-1.
